m_szDocSumamry: Honda to debut hydrogen fuel cell-powered FCV Concept at Detroit auto show View/Post Comments DETROIT, MI -Â Honda Motor Co. says its FCV Concept demonstrates the company's latest advancements in hydrogen fuel cell technology. It's making its North American debut at the 2015 North American International Auto Show in Detroit next week, after first being shown to the world in Japan last November.
